metadata.name: Process Proxy Execution Via Squirrel.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects the usage of the "Squirrel.exe" binary to execute arbitrary processes. This binary is part of multiple Electron based software installations (Slack, Teams, Discord, etc.)

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\squirrel.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\update.exe'))) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--processstart')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--processstartandwait')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--createshortcut'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\discord\\\\update.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' --processstart')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('discord.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\githubdesktop\\\\update.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('githubdesktop.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--createshortcut')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--processstartandwait'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\microsoft\\\\teams\\\\update.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('teams.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--processstart')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--createshortcut'))) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(':\\\\users\\\\')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\appdata\\\\local\\\\yammerdesktop\\\\update.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('yammer.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--processstart')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--createshortcut')))))

output.summary: Detects the usage of the "Squirrel.exe" binary to execute arbitrary processes. This binary is part of multiple Electron based software installations (Slack, Teams, Discord, etc.)

metadata.objective: False positive: Expected FP with some Electron based applications such as (1Clipboard, Beaker Browser, Caret, Discord, GitHub Desktop, etc.) References: https://lolbas-project.github.io/lolbas/OtherMSBinaries/Squirrel/, http://www.hexacorn.com/blog/2019/03/30/sqirrel-packages-manager-as-a-lolbin-a-k-a-many-electron-apps-are-lolbins-by-default/, http://www.hexacorn.com/blog/2018/08/16/squirrel-as-a-lolbin/
